title: Natural Oils used in Perfumery Introductory Course with NOVA Perfumer Julia Zangrilli
desc:
This is a condensed, intensive introduction to the world of natural essential oils and absolutes used in fine fragrance and aromatherapy. Attendees will evaluate 20 natural oils, which cover all natural olfactive families. We will smell and discuss citrus, floral, spice, rustic, green, balsamic, woody, aquatic, resinous and animalic categories. There are touches on genealogy, bits of history, explanation of oil-extraction methods and fragrance structure. Hand-outs and suggested readings will be provided, there will also be a short Q+A with NOVA perfumer Julia Zangrilli at the end. 
 2 hours
